700250f-a.text:
East 178th Street, west from (No. 623) but not including Hughes Ave. (right), to (No. 591) and including Arthur Ave. Also shown is a general view, in a northwesterly direction, as seen from the Bergen Building, at the S.E. corner of East Tremont and Arthur Aves. The south side of East 178th Street, seen as being occupied by a 2-story frame house and clearances, is at this date (1938) occupied by two large 6-story
apartment houses.
May 1926.
Brown Brothers.
